/*Project Section*/
#projects .services{
    flex-direction: column;
    text-align: center;
    max-width: 1500px;
    margin: 0 auto;
    padding: 100px 0;
}
#projects .section-title{
    font-size: 4rem;
    font-weight: 300;
    color: black;
    margin-bottom: 10px;
    text-transform: uppercase;
    letter-spacing: .2rem;
    text-align: center;
}
#projects .sectio-title span{
    color: crimson;
}
#projects .project-bottom{
    display: flex;
    align-items: center;
    justify-content: center;
    flex-wrap: wrap;
    margin-top: 50px;
}
#projects .project-item{
    flex-basis: 80%;
    display: flex;
    align-items: flex-start;
    justify-content: center;
    flex-direction: column;
    padding: 30px;
    border-radius: 10px;
    background-image: url(img/photo_2024-01-19_20-38-51.jpg );
    background-size: cover;
    margin: 10px 5%;
    position: relative;
    z-index: 1;
    overflow: hidden;
}
#projects .project-item::after{
    content: '';
    position: absolute;
    left: 0;
    top: 0;
    height: 100%;
    width: 100%;
    background-image: linear-gradient(60deg, #29323c 0%,   #485563 100%);
    opacity: .8;
    z-index: -1;
}
#projects .project-bottom .icon{
    height: 80px;
    width: 80px;
    margin-bottom: 20px;
}
#projects .project-item h2{
    font-size: 2rem;
    color: white;
    margin-bottom: 10px;
    text-transform: uppercase;
}
#projects .project-item p{
    color: white;
}
/*EndProject Section*/
